markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Undetectability](/Equipment.aspx?ID=195)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=130" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 563 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 4,400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Drinking this dull-black liquid makes you undetectable to divinations. This grants the same effects as [_mind blank_](/Spells.aspx?ID=192), but without the bonus against mental effects. You also gain the effects of a 4th-level [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164) spell, which protects against [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) spells of 8th level and lower and has a DC of 36 against [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344). The potion’s effects last for 10 minutes. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Potion of Undetectability

text: <title level="1" right="Item 18" pfs="Standard" > Potion of Undetectability Source Core Rulebook pg. 563 4.0 Price 4,400 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk L Activate Single Action Interact --- Drinking this dull-black liquid makes you undetectable to divinations. This grants the same effects as mind blank , but without the bonus against mental effects. You also gain the effects of a 4th-level invisibility spell, which protects against see invisibility spells of 8th level and lower and has a DC of 36 against true seeing . The potion’s effects last for 10 minutes.
